ing: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger coffee flavored liqueur
1/2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger Irish cream liqueur
1/2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger creme de menthe
des: "This is an alcoholic drink for the White Russian lover. The twist is the addition of creme de menthe which not only give it a nice green color but makes the whole drink taste like a mint cookie!"
ins: Fill an 8 ounce tumbler with ice. Pour in the vodka, coffee flavored liqueur, Irish cream, and half-and-half; stir. Drizzle creme de menthe on top to garnish.
